mapper.insert: insert into board2 values(board_seq.nextval, #{image}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{contents}, default, default)
mapper.select: select * from (select row_number()over(order by seq desc) as rown, board2.* from board2) where rown between #{startNavi} and #{endNavi}
mapper.update: update board2 set view_count=view_count+1 where seq=#{value}
